H0.text: What is confit meat cooked and preserved in. Oil

H1.text: What is confit meat cooked and preserved in. Vinegar

H2.text: What is confit meat cooked and preserved in. Broth

H3.text: What is confit meat cooked and preserved in. Fat

A4.text: The meat is salted and seasoned with herbs and slowly cooked submerged in its own rendered fat... preserved by allowing it to cool and storing it in the fat.

A5.text: Confit describes the process of cooking food in fat, whether it be grease or oil, at a lower temperature compared to deep frying.
